how-to-use.question: How to use Time for Music?
how-to-use.answer: Time for Music generates QR music game cards based on your Spotify playlists. Simply share the URL of your playlist with us, and we'll create a set of cards that link to your music. After you have made your selection we will present a downloadable PDF file!

what-to-do.question: What can I do with the cards?
what-to-do.answer:
The cards are perfect for game nights, parties, or just for fun! You can use them to play a music quiz with your friends, challenge your family to guess the song, or simply enjoy your favorite music in a new way. The cards are also a great gift for music lovers!

The first time around you will be asked to install our app on your phone. After this is done you can use the app to scan the cards. The song will start playing automatically after the card has been scanned and you and your friends can start guessing the song and artist!

phone-compatibility.question: Is my phone suitable?
phone-compatibility.answer: Currently we only support Android devices, so as long as you have an Android phone that can scan a QR code, you can scan the cards.

spotify-premium.question: Do I need Spotify Premium?
spotify-premium.answer: Yes. To automatically play the cards after scanning the QR code, you need a Spotify Premium account. If you don't have a Premium account, the link will open, but you will need to manually play the music.

card-dimensions.question: What are the dimension of the cards?
card-dimensions.answer: The cards are 60 x 60 mm (2.36 x 2.36 inches).

mistakes.question: I have found a mistake on a playing card
mistakes.answer: We do our best to provide you with the most accurate information, but mistakes can happen. If you find an error in the data on your cards, please let us know. If it is indeed a mistake we will correct it and send you the digital, corrected version of your playlist for free!

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy of Time for Music!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Time for Music! We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy details the information we collect, how it is used and shared, and your rights regarding your data.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: Personal Information: We collect your email when you are placing an order. This enables us to send the generated playlist to the right email address and keep track of the purchase history.

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.content: Data Hosting and Storage: We use Firebase to host the data collected. Your personal data is stored securely on Firebase, and we do not share it with any third-party services other than for the purpose of data hosting.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take the security of your data seriously. Your personal information is stored securely on Firebase, protected with industry-standard encryption protocols both in transit and at rest. We implement stringent security measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, and misuse of your data.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access, Correction, and Deletion: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal data at any time. If you wish to request deletion, please contact us through the contact form.
Data Portability: You have the right to request a copy of the data we hold about you in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
Right to Object: You have the right to object to this processing if you feel it impacts your personal rights and freedoms. You can exercise this right by contacting us through the contact form.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Data we collect may be processed and stored in any country where our servers or service providers are located. We ensure that data transferred to and from Firebase adheres to stringent data protection standards to maintain the security and confidentiality of your information.
